import React, { useEffect} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "./../components/Header"; import { PayPalButton } from "react-paypal-button-v2"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getOrderDetails } from "../Redux/Actions/OrderActions"; import Loading from './../components/LoadingError/Loading'; import Message from './../components/LoadingError/Error'; const OrderScreen = ({match}) => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); const orderId = match.params.id; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const orderDetails = useSelector((state)=> state.orderDetails); const { order, loading, error} = orderDetails; useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) },[dispatch, orderId]) return ( <>

admin@example.com

{/* 2 */}

Shipping: Tanzania

Pay method: Paypal

{/* 3 */}

Address: Arusha Tz, Ngaramtoni Crater, P.O BOX 1234 Arusha Tz

Not Delivered

{/* Your order is empty */}

QUANTITY

4

SUBTOTAL

$456
{/* total */}
Products $234
Shipping $566
Tax $3
Total $567
); }; export default OrderScreen;
